points.label: Electronic Health Record (EHR)
points.info: Mr. Smith: 2/1/2015, 8 a.m., PPT 58; recommend heparin bolus: 80 units/kg.

questions.question: Name the information system involved in the message "recommend heparin bolus: 80 units/kg" displayed on the EHR.
questions.feedback: Makes a recommendation for treatment depending on lab results.

questions.question: How could the heparin recommendation on the screen have been made even safer, given the interoperability of all hospital systems?
choices: By calculating the exact dose based on the patient’s weight in kg
By sending a notice to the Provider Order Entry System
By sending a notice to the pharmacy
answers: By calculating the exact dose based on the patient’s weight in kg
questions.feedback: Forcing the caregiver to calculate the dose manually introduces a source for error.

questions.question: Name the information system involved in the message "Mr. Smith: 2/1/2015, 8 a.m., PPT 58."
questions.feedback: Point of care system that supports care by providing instant access to the clinician.

questions.question: The nurse looks at the "computerized provider information system" and finds an order for a stat bolus of heparin. The nurse has confidence in this order for which of the following reasons? (Check all that apply.)
choices: The dose is based on accurate, current information
The system ensures that the name of the drug is accurate.
The pharmacy has received a copy of this order.
The system has checked for the possibility of drug interaction, allergy, or overdose.
answers: The dose is based on accurate, current information
The system ensures that the name of the drug is accurate.
The pharmacy has received a copy of this order.
The system has checked for the possibility of drug interaction, allergy, or overdose.

questions.question: The nurse looks at the scheduling system. In terms of administrative processes related to patient care, what information will be there?
choices: The nurse's work schedule for the coming month.
Electronic scheduling for the next PPT draw.
answers: Electronic scheduling for the next PPT draw.
